SIGN.SIGNATURE_CREATE_DETAIL:
Simple signature
The recipient signs by checking a box. This is the fastest and most user-friendly signing method. The steps are as follows:
  • Determine the signing order (optional)
  • Add the email address of each signature
  • Send the document for signature : each recipient then receives an email from contact@legal-pilot.com (may be in spam) inviting them to sign
  • The signatories accept the conditions service and click 'send document' to sign
  • When all signatories have signed, everyone receives a confirmation email with the signed document attached
  • For your part, the document appears as signed in Legal Pilot, and you can download the audit trail (proof of signature)
SIGN.SIGNATURIT_INFO: The process is carried out by our partner Signaturit, a link has been sent by email to the recipients, you can check the status of the signature here.
